statements: SELECT * FROM voting_statistics WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_id, vote_choice FROM voting_statistics WHERE vote_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT vote_choice, voter_id, vote_date FROM voting_statistics WHERE participation_rate > 50;
SELECT * FROM voting_statistics ORDER BY vote_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_statistics WHERE voter_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT voter_id, vote_choice FROM voting_statistics WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voting_statistics WHERE vote_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT voter_id, vote_choice FROM voting_statistics WHERE vote_choice IN ('Yes', 'No');
SELECT voter_id, vote_date FROM voting_statistics ORDER BY vote_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_statistics GROUP BY voter_id HAVING total_votes > 5;
SELECT * FROM voting_statistics;
SELECT voter_id, vote_option, vote_datetime FROM voting_statistics WHERE vote_option = 'Option A';
SELECT voter_id, vote_option, vote_datetime FROM voting_statistics ORDER BY vote_datetime DESC;
SELECT voter_id, vote_option, vote_datetime FROM voting_statistics WHERE vote_datetime > '2021-01-01';
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_statistics GROUP BY voter_id;
SELECT * FROM voting_statistics ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT vote_option, vote_datetime FROM voting_statistics WHERE vote_option='Yes';
SELECT voter_id, vote_datetime FROM voting_statistics WHERE vote_option='No' ORDER BY vote_datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM participation_rates WHERE participation_percent > 50 ORDER BY participation_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participation_date, participation_percent FROM participation_rates WHERE participation_percent < 30;
SELECT * FROM voting_statistics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, total_votes FROM voting_statistics WHERE participation_rate > 0.5;
SELECT date, total_votes, participation_rate FROM voting_statistics WHERE total_votes > 10000 ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM participation_rates WHERE participation_rate BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6 ORDER BY participation_rate DESC;
SELECT performance_id, performance_rating FROM governance_performance WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM voting_statistics WHERE total_votes > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, date, total_votes FROM voting_statistics WHERE participation_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT MAX(total_votes) AS max_votes, AVG(participation_rate) AS avg_part_rate FROM voting_statistics;
SELECT SUM(total_votes) AS total_votes_sum, COUNT(DISTINCT voter_id) AS unique_voters FROM voting_statistics GROUP BY date;
SELECT * FROM participation_rates WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND participation_rate < 0.4 ORDER BY participation_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_statistics;
SELECT voter_id, vote_option FROM governance_performance WHERE evaluation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, participation_rate FROM participation_rates WHERE participation_rate > 50.00;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_records GROUP BY voter_id;
SELECT * FROM governance_performance ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM voting_statistics;
SELECT voter_id, vote_option FROM voting_records WHERE vote_option = 'Yes';
SELECT voter_id, participation_rate FROM participation_rates ORDER BY participation_rate DESC;
SELECT governance_metric, metric_value FROM governance_performance WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_records WHERE vote_option = 'No';
SELECT * FROM voting_participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM voting_participants ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT voting_topic, vote_decision FROM voting_records WHERE voting_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY voting_date ASC;
SELECT statistic_id, total_votes, approval_rate FROM voting_statistics WHERE approval_rate > 80;
SELECT performance_id, performance_rating FROM governance_performance WHERE voting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM voting_participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, participation_status FROM voting_participants ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT voting_topic, vote_decision FROM voting_records WHERE voting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT statistic_id, voting_topic, total_votes, approval_rate FROM voting_statistics WHERE total_votes > 100 ORDER BY approval_rate DESC;
SELECT voting_topic, vote_decision FROM voting_records JOIN voting_participants ON voting_records.participant_id = voting_participants.participant_id WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
